results.message: Form control element <input> has no associated label
Verify the '::before' and '::after' pseudo-elements do not insert non-decorative content
Verify the '::before' and '::after' pseudo-elements do not insert non-decorative content
Check the keyboard focus indicator is highly visible when using CSS declaration for 'border' or 'outline'
Verify color is not used as the only visual means of conveying information
Confirm Windows high contrast mode is supported when using CSS to include, position or alter non-decorative content

HAAC_BackgroundImg_HasTextOrTitle.0: Background images that convey important information must have a text alternative that describes the image

RPT_Blockquote_WrapsTextQuote.0: Quotations should be marked with <q> or <blockquote> elements

RPT_List_UseMarkup.0: Use proper HTML list elements to create lists

WCAG20_Elem_Lang_Valid.0: The language of content must be valid and specified in accordance with BCP 47
WCAG20_Elem_Lang_Valid.Pass_0: Lang has a valid primary lang and conforms to BCP 47

WCAG20_Text_Emoticons.0: Emoticons must have a short text alternative that describes their purpose

WCAG20_Text_LetterSpacing.0: Use CSS 'letter-spacing' to control spacing within a word

Rpt_Aria_MultipleDocumentRoles.0: All elements with a "document" role must have unique labels

IBMA_Color_Contrast_WCAG2AA_PV.0: The contrast ratio of text with its background (i.e. background with a color gradient or a background image) must meet WCAG 2.1 AA requirements

RPT_Title_Valid.0: Page <title> should be a descriptive title, rather than a filename

WCAG20_A_TargetAndText.0: Users should be warned in advance if their input action will open a new window or otherwise change their context

RPT_Blink_CSSTrigger1.0: Do not use the "blink" value of the 'text-decoration' property for longer than five seconds

RPT_Style_BackgroundImage.0: Images included by using CSS alone must not convey important information

RPT_Style_ColorSemantics1.0: Combine color and descriptive markup to convey information
RPT_Style_ColorSemantics1.Potential_1: Verify color is not used as the only visual means of conveying information

RPT_Style_Trigger2.0: Windows high contrast mode must be supported when using CSS to include, position or alter non-decorative content
RPT_Style_Trigger2.Manual_1: Confirm Windows high contrast mode is supported when using CSS to include, position or alter non-decorative content

WCAG20_Style_BeforeAfter.0: Do not use CSS '::before' and '::after' pseudo-elements to insert non-decorative content
WCAG20_Style_BeforeAfter.Potential_1: Verify the '::before' and '::after' pseudo-elements do not insert non-decorative content

WCAG21_Style_Viewport.0: Text must scale up to 200% without loss of content or functionality

style_hover_persistent.0: The pointer should be able to move over content displayed on hover
style_hover_persistent.Pass_0: the hover: pseudo-class is not used to display content

RPT_Elem_UniqueId.0: Element 'id' attribute values must be unique within a document

RPT_Text_SensoryReference.0: Instructions must be meaningful without shape or location words

RPT_Block_ShouldBeHeading.0: Heading text must use a heading element

Valerie_Label_HasContent.0: A <label> element must have non-empty descriptive text that identifies the purpose of the interactive component
Valerie_Label_HasContent.Pass_Regular: <label> element has accessible name with inner content

IBMA_Color_Contrast_WCAG2AA.0: The contrast ratio of text with its background must meet WCAG 2.1 AA requirements

RPT_Img_AltCommonMisuse.0: 'alt' attribute value must be a good inline replacement for the image

WCAG20_Input_HasOnchange.0: Verify that any changes of context are explained in advance to the user

WCAG20_Input_InFieldSet.0: Groups of logically related input elements should be contained within a <fieldset> element

Rpt_Aria_ValidIdRef.0: The ARIA property must reference a non-empty unique id of an existing element that is visible

Rpt_Aria_ValidProperty.0: ARIA attributes must be valid for the element's role

RPT_Style_HinderFocus1.0: The keyboard focus indicator must be highly visible when default border or outline is modified by CSS
RPT_Style_HinderFocus1.Potential_1: Check the keyboard focus indicator is highly visible when using CSS declaration for 'border' or 'outline'

IBMA_Focus_MultiTab.0: Certain components must have no more than one tabbable element

IBMA_Focus_Tabbable.0: Component must have at least one tabbable element

WCAG20_Input_ExplicitLabel.0: Each form control must have an associated label
WCAG20_Input_ExplicitLabel.Fail_1: Form control element <{0}> has no associated label

aria_semantics_attribute.0: ARIA attributes must be valid for the element and ARIA role to which they are assigned
